main event: A UFO was observed making a controlled flight over Dayton and vicinity on 20 May 1952.
interesting points: The object was estimated to fly at about 2,000 mph and made a controlled descent and landing south of Dayton., The observation lasted around 10 minutes., The object was under surveillance by tracking radar and visual observation., It began to increase in size as it descended rapidly and seemed to be glowing., Witnesses described it as round or oval in shape, moving at a high rate of speed.
